resources.string: The Websites\' button does nothing because it wasn\'t specified on the lab. \nThe terminology button lets you search commonly used android terms
The box below is an autocomplete text box. The definition will be shown once you select the term.
Linux command used to export variables to child processes

A build automation tool that builds upon the concepts of Apache Ant and Apache Maven and introduces a Groovy-based domain-specific language (DSL) instead of the more traditional XML form of declaring the project configuration.
Android Debug Bridge that lets you communicate with an emulator instance
Hardware or software that allows a computer to behave like another computer system
